cast.overview: The Hong Kong super-cop must stop a group of blackmailing bombers at the same time that the villains of the first Police Story are out for revenge.
cast.title: Police Story 2

details.biography: Kiki Sheung Tin-Ngor (Chinese: 商天娥)  is a Hong Kong film and television actress. She debuted in the 12th TVB artist training class, and became an artiste of the station after graduation. In the 1980s, she was the head of Huadan. In 1995, she switched to ATV, but due to ATV's heavy losses, the production of dramas was reduced. Kiki went to mainland China and Taiwan to develop her skills for a period of time.
details.name: Kiki Sheung
details.place_of_birth: Hong Kong, British Crown Colony [now China]
